channel.title: Do you have low FPS while playing RuneScape, but not in other games?
channel.description:
RuneScape is very unstable, and huge memory hog, I was wondering how many people have ridiculously low fps while playing RuneScape.
I have a decent computer, built with low budjet 4 years ago: 4x1GB(4GB) RAM Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 3.15GHz AMD Radeon HD 6670[Core 900Mhz, Memory 1150Mhz, Performance settings while playing RS] Windows 7 Ultimate [s] I get 10-20 FPS while PKing with DirectX rendering mode(Lowest settings possible) And about 30-40FPS in uncrowded areas[/s]
EDIT: Now I get 50 FPS no matter what, I overclocked my CPU 2.20->3.15GHz
To Radeon HD users:[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,525579.0.html]Fix for Radeon HD cards[/url]
Post here what you have voted, the fps count while PKing and in uncrowded areas and your system specs.

item.title: Do you have low FPS while playing RuneScape, but not in other games?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“shrogg, post:26, topic:422917”][quote author=CreatorAlex link=topic=525580.msg3829440#msg3829440 date=1322442595]
I get around 20 FPS in uncrowded areas, with about 15 in crowded areas.

You guys are embarrassed at your specs? Wow.

[Alternative]

I really have an Intel graphics card, but drivers won’t work for Windows 7.
[/quote]

I just cant help it but laugh when i read your specs Why in the world are you running windows 7 with… THAT?
ugh![/quote]
I think it’s faster to run windows 7 with that, or somehow I just think that way, not sure if it’s true though.

Read full topic

@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:22, topic:422917"]When I’m in wildy, my offheap rises very very fast, 1k+ every millisecond. And it has even reached 128MB I think, it’s always red when I PK.
Don’t know what it is though.[/quote]
So many players in an area. I get it too and my Computers amazing:(. Its Runescape itself I think.

item.title: Do you have low FPS while playing RuneScape, but not in other games?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

50 fps uncrowded area’s not doing much.
about 30fps on highest full-screen etc.
take into consideration i msn etc at the same time thats smexi.
My internet provider loves to give me lag spikes though… so it’ll be 50fps bang lag then back to 50fps. offheaps always about 100k and ping usually 22ms unless lag spike then about 1.1k

HP dc7600 CMT
